system.Text:
__When you receive medical care or provide treatment__, envision the situation and roll. If you...

  * Receive treatment from someone (not an ally): Roll +iron
  * Mend your own wounds: Roll +iron or +wits, whichever is lower
  * Obtain treatment for a companion: Roll +heart
  * Provide care: Roll +wits

On a __strong hit__, the care is helpful. If you (or the ally under your care) are wounded, clear the impact and take or give +2 health. Otherwise, take or give +3 health.

On a __weak hit__, as above, but the recovery costs extra time or resources. Choose one: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2) or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.0fcfea7696d1de15]{Sacrifice Resources} (-2).

On a __miss__, the aid is ineffective and the situation worsens. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.
